description: Phonics Card Images - add illustrations for example words with tap-to-flip interaction on phonics flashcards

userStories.title: Add ImagePath field to GraphemeCard model
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the data model to support an image path per phonics card so illustrations can be wired up.
acceptanceCriteria: Add ImagePath property (string, nullable) to GraphemeCard in Models/PhonicsModels.cs
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Simple model change. Add 'public string? ImagePath { get; set; }' to the GraphemeCard class.

userStories.title: Add tap-to-flip interaction on PhonicsCard page
userStories.description: As a user, I want to tap a phonics card to flip between the grapheme view and an image of the example word so I can build visual associations.
acceptanceCriteria: Tapping the card area (grapheme + word section) flips to show the image + word
Tapping again flips back to the grapheme view
Flip uses a gentle CSS transition (~0.4s, matching learning cards style)
The example word remains visible on both sides
If no image is set (ImagePath is null), tapping does nothing and card does not flip
The Got it! button, previous/next arrows, and back button are NOT part of the flippable area
Flip state resets when navigating to a different card (in OnParametersSetAsync)
Uses phonics colour theme (calm-phonics #7BA3C4)
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Add a bool ShowImage toggle in PhonicsCard.razor.cs. The card body area gets an @onclick handler. When ShowImage is true, render an instead of the grapheme/hint. The example word with highlighted grapheme stays visible on both sides. Reset ShowImage = false at the start of OnParametersSetAsync. Only enable click when CurrentCard?.ImagePath is not null.

userStories.title: Add Phase 2 phonics images and wire up paths
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to add illustration PNGs for all concrete Phase 2 example words and set their ImagePath in PhonicsDataService.
acceptanceCriteria: PNG files added to wwwroot/images/phonics/ for Phase 2 cards with concrete example words, named by card ID (e.g. p2-w1-s.png)
Each image clearly represents the example word (sun, ant, tap, pin, etc.)
Cards with abstract/hard-to-illustrate words (e.g. it, on, up, got, yes) are skipped — no ImagePath set, card does not flip
All illustrated Phase 2 cards in PhonicsDataService.cs have ImagePath set to images/phonics/{id}.png
Images render correctly when tapping a Phase 2 card to flip
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Images must already exist in wwwroot/images/phonics/ before this story can be completed. The story wires up ImagePath values in PhonicsDataService.cs for Phase 2 BuildWeek calls. Abstract words to skip: 'it' (p2-w2-i), 'got' (p2-w3-g), 'on' (p2-w3-o), 'up' (p2-w4-u), 'win' (p2-w7-w), 'yes' (p2-w7-y). Concrete words to include: sun, ant, tap, pin, net, mat, dog, cat, kid, duck, egg, red, hat, bat, fan, puff, leg, bell, hiss, van, fox, zip, buzz, queen, chip, shop, thin, ring, pink.

userStories.title: E2E test for phonics card flip interaction

acceptanceCriteria: Test: tapping a phonics card with an image flips to show the image
Test: tapping again flips back to show the grapheme

Test: Got it! button still works after flipping
All tests pass
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Add tests to PhonicsTests.cs. Navigate to a Phase 2 card that has an image (e.g. /phonics/2/card/p2-w1-s which shows 'sun'). Test the flip toggle, then navigate to next card and verify flip resets. Use relative href selectors per CLAUDE.md.
